product_a.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
product_a.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

product_b.name: LuminaGlow C+ Serum
product_b.key_ingredients: Vitamin C, Ferulic Acid, Vitamin E

comparison_points: Concentration: GlowBoost contains 10% Vitamin C, while LuminaGlow C+ offers a higher 15% concentration.
Skin Suitability: GlowBoost is targeted for Oily and Combination skin, whereas LuminaGlow C+ is formulated for All Skin Types.
Ingredients: GlowBoost highlights Hyaluronic Acid for hydration; LuminaGlow includes Ferulic Acid and Vitamin E for stability.
Usage: GlowBoost requires 2-3 drops in the morning; LuminaGlow suggests 4-5 drops daily.
Price: GlowBoost is more affordable at ₹699 compared to LuminaGlow C+ at ₹799.
